"Xiera": "Hello! This is the \"Hero Basics\" training course."
"Hero is a class designed to <red>let one person fight many enemies at once<c>."
"Whilst it uses the already-existing Sword, Twin Machinegun and Talis weapon types, it uses them in ways that have never been seen before!"
"First, try hitting an enemy with the Hero Sword PA <red>Brightness End's Held Attack<c>!"
"Task 1: <yellow>Hit an enemy with Brightness End's Held Attack"
"Task 1: <yellow>Hit an enemy with Brightness End's Held Attack"

"・Use \"Brightness End\" with <%PhotonArts>
\u3000and hold the button until it is
\u3000charged
・Hit an enemy with the Held
\u3000Attack"

"Hero Sword features fast attacks with a very wide range.

All Hero Sword PAs have additional effects that occur when holding the PA button, such as being able to be charged, or switching to other Hero weapons automatically."
